name: fire-exe-website
description: Fire Exe personal website with Resend email integration

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cp -r *.html *.js *.png CNAME README.md api/ build/ && cp -f config.js firebase-config.js build/ && rm -f build/config.js.example build/firebase-config.js.example build/send-email-server.js build/server.js

author: Fire Exe
